programme.desc: Jasper goes to jail on false burglary charges, so Henry and Ray set out to free him. (repeat).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob's lightweight appearance prevents him from entering the toughest club in Bikini Bottom; and Squidward brags to a former school rival that he owns a five-star restaurant. Voices include...Squilliam: Dee Bradley Baker. Reg: Tom Wilson. Doctor Fish: Carlos Alazraqui. Tom: Mr. Lawrence. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four turtles exposed to radiation turn into life-size ninjas and fight crime in a major city, with the help of a sensei rat and a TV reporter.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Race Car Bed
programme.desc: Monica orders a bed from the store owned by Janice's estranged husband; Joey teaches soap-opera acting; Ross struggles through a dinner with Rachel's abrasive father. Dr. Green: Ron Leibman. Janice: Maggie Wheeler. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. Ross: David Schwimmer. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Giant Poking Device
programme.desc: Joey reveals to Chandler that he saw Janice kissing her estranged husband; Rachel and Monica baby-sit Ben; Phoebe explains her fear of the dentist. Janice: Maggie Wheeler. Phoebe: Lisa Kudrow. Monica: Courteney Cox. Joey: Matt LeBlanc. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister
programme.desc: A drunken Chandler has a liaison with one of Joey's sisters; a nice guy recommends Rachel for a job. Mark: Steven Eckholdt. Cookie: Alex Meneses. Nonna: Penny Santon. Mary Angela: Holly Gagnier. Mary Therese: Mimi Lieber. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. (repeat).

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Jealousy
programme.desc: Ross is jealous of Mark; a romantic poet criticizes Monica in verse; Joey's a dancing fool for a Broadway musical audition. Mark: Steven Eckholdt. Rachel: Jennifer Aniston. Ross: David Schwimmer. (repeat).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Bonnie loses her job and struggles to piece her life together, sparking Christy to give her a helping hand. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Christy realizes life is easier with Bonnie in the house, but she has trouble accepting that fact. Meanwhile, Baxter sets up camp in the driveway. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Christy and Bonnie try to help a sick friend and her eight cats. Meanwhile, the reality of pregnancy frustrates Violet. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Bonnie begins dating Chef Rudy, with Christy stuck in the middle. Jon Cryer directed the episode. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.desc: At her trial, Benny must rely on George's testimony since her lawyer (Adam West) and even her mother (Rita Moreno) have all turned on her. Judge Alvarez: Marilyn Milian. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: Sabes Gay, It's George's Fantasy Episode
programme.desc: George hallucinates that he and Ernie are gay and about to be married after downing a worm along with his drink at Thirsty's Bar, where he has gone to drown his sorrows after a humiliating day at work. Making matters worse, he and Angie are fighting because of his reluctance to open up about his problems. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: George Lopez
programme.sub-title: George Thinks Vic's Fiancee Is Lion About Being a Cheetah
programme.desc: George seeks help from a popular reality-TV show in order to expose Vic's cheating, gold-digging fiancée (Stacy Keibler). (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly plans a birthday sleepover for Adam, but things go awry when a friend brings his dad's home-brewed beer and gets everyone sick. Meanwhile, Murray promises Erica and Barry a new CD player on the condition that they write the greatest song ever. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam, thinking Pop's good luck might rub off on him, takes a gamble and ends up losing his beloved toys. Meanwhile, Erica's dream of appearing on a popular TV dance show turns into a nightmare when Barry gives her pink eye. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.sub-title: House Sittin' for Sandy; Smooth Jazz at Bikini Bottom
programme.desc: SpongeBob agrees to be Sandy's house sitter, but chaos erupts when Patrick visits; SpongeBob and Squidward try to sneak backstage at a concert after losing their passes. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: A fed-up Squidward resorts to legal action to keep SpongeBob away; Plankton mistakenly swipes a piece of art instead of a Krabby Patty. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.sub-title: The Inmates of Summer; To Save a Squirrel
